openGraph.title: Development of Web applications and Websites
openGraph.description: We create an IT product that makes a profit at minimal cost

banner.header: Development of Web applications and Websites
banner.text1: We create an IT product that makes a profit at minimal cost
banner.text2:
We immerse ourselves in your business (your ideas), study problems,
formulate tasks, find solutions, and create a digital product.

item1.text: We create useful and convenient services that sell and bring new customers

item2.text: We have a team composed of experts in programming and business. Thus, we analyze the tasks from all angles and offer the most appropriate solutions

item3.text: We use only modern and trusted tools to achieve maximum efficiency with the smallest investment

item4.text: We consult our clients on the possibilities for grant applications

form.text: Please leave a request and we will be happy to consult you at no charge.

policy.plain_text: By clicking the submit button, you agree to
policy.link_text: the terms of the privacy policy.

modal.header: Your application has been sent successfully

how_we_work.header: How do we work on the project

item1.text: We discuss in detail the tasks that you need to handle

item2.text: We create a technical description explaining what the system does and its functionality

item3.text: We define the main components of the system and design each element

item4.text: We choose the tools and ways to guarantee the quality of the work performed

item5.text: We perform technical realization of the product, its testing and required modifications

item1.text: HTML 5, CSS 3, JS, jQuery, React.js, Svelte.js, Vue.js

item2.text: Java, Php, SQL, NoSQL, Python, C#, С++

main.text: We are a team of IT projects developers working for our customers

about.text1: We create individual interfaces, web projects featuring a sophisticated design.
about.text2: We generate new ideas for your business.
about.text3: We provide a full range of services starting with drafting the technical requirements and ending with further support of the project.

contacts.text: If you have an IT task, but you do not know how to handle it, our team can do it for you. Send us a description of your IT tasks, we will analyze them and get in touch with you.
